Module kivakit.core
Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.time

Class Hour

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.core.time.BaseTime<Hour>
com.telenav.kivakit.core.time.Hour
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.numeric.Zeroable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.string.AsString, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.string.StringFormattable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.time.PointInTime<Hour,Duration>, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.time.TimeMeasurement, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.value.LongValued, Comparable<com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.time.PointInTime<?,?>>
public class Hour extends BaseTime<Hour>
Represents an hour on a clock, either as a military hour or using the meridiem (am/pm) system.

Creation

  • am(int) - A morning hour
  • militaryHour(int) - An hour of the day on a 24-hour clock
  • militaryHours() - All 24 military hours
  • hourOfDay(int, Meridiem) - An hour of the day, AM or PM
  • midnight() - Hour zero
  • noon() - Hour twelve
  • pm(int) - An afternoon or evening hour

Accessors

  • BaseTime.asUnits() - The hour
  • meridiem() - AM, PM or 24-hour

Conversions

  • asMilitaryHour() - The hour on a 24-hour clock
  • asMeridiemHour() - The hour, either AM or PM
Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
